verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <WH8435> tol-Dot Now these [are] the generations בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the sons נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> No-ach, of Noah שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> shem Shem חָ֣ם <WH2526> cham Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <WH3315> va-Ya-fet; and Japheth וַיִּוָּלְד֥וּ <WH3205> vai-yiv-val-Du born לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> ba-Nim and unto them were sons אַחַ֥ר <WH310> 'a-Char after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <WH3999> ham-mab-Bul. the flood

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יֶ֔פֶת <WH3315> Ye-fet, of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <WH1586> Go-mer Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <WH4031> u-ma-Gog, and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <WH4074> u-ma-Dai and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <WH3120> ve-ya-Van and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <WH8422> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <WH4902> u-Me-shech and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <WH8494> ve-ti-Ras. and Tiras

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons חָ֑ם <WH2526> Cham; of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> kush Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> u-mitz-Ra-yim and Mizraim וּפ֥וּט <WH6316> u-Fut and Phut וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> u-che-Na-'an. and Canaan
